title: download update stucked at 79 %
body: riot instead of nerf fix the patches and glitches  please there is problem installing and updating the games and stops at 79 % for 5 hours i restarted the pc and now it shows it need 5gb data of update my connection has good speed yet it dosnt download

replies.body: Your connection might have gone dormant for some reason and stopped grabbing the patch files from our server. I'd recommend updating some of your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and possibly switching to an ethernet connection while the game is updating if possible.
